description: Single storey rear and side return extension and second storey mansard extension
decision_conditions: <p>All new external facing and roofing materials with the exception of the timber cladding in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including type, size, colour, bond, pointing, coursing, jointing, profile and texture.&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</p>

Prior to superstructure works, detailed specifications, a drainage layout, and a management & maintenance plan (where applicable) of the water butt with overflow shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume.REASON: To reduce the risk of flooding through SuDs.

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p>The timber cladding, hereby approved, shall match the provided sample; Tudor Fire Finished Cladding in respect of materials used, detailed execution, and finished appearance including type,&nbsp; colour, and texture.&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</p>

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p>Details of swift bird boxes to be implemented as part of the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority, prior to the occupation of the development hereby approved. </p><p>REASON: To improve biodiversity at the site.</p>
